org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.propositional
Class PLReasoner

java.lang.Object
  org.svvrl.goal.core.logic.propositional.PLReasoner

public class PLReasoner
extends java.lang.Object

The class provides a reasoner for entailments of classical propositional formulae.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai

public boolean entails(PL antecedent,
                       PL consequent)
Returns true if antecedent entails consequent.

Parameters:

entails

public boolean entails(java.util.Collection<PL> antecedent,
                       PL consequent)
Returns true if antecedent entails consequent. All formulae in antecedent are assumed when proving consequent.

Parameters:
antecedent - a collection of propositional formulae
consequent - a propositional formula
Returns:
true if antecedent entails consequent

isContradiction

public boolean isContradiction(java.util.Collection<PL> fs)
Returns true if a collection of formulae introduces contradiction.

Parameters:
fs - a collection of propositional formulae
Returns:
true if the formulae introduce contradiction
